text: Bordj Bou Arréridj is a province in east Algeria. It is about 200 km away from the capital Algiers. The capital is Bordj Bou Arreridj. ==Divisions== The province has 10 districts and 34 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # Aïn Taghrout # Bir Kasd Ali # Bordj Bou Arréridj (District-municipality) # Bordj Ghedir # Bordj Zemmoura # Djaâfra # El Hamadia # Mansourah # Medjana # Ras El Oued ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
title: Bordj Bou Arréridj Province
